title: Celebrity First Dates Hotel: Duncan James makes joke as date chokes on fish ball
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Duncan James made a cheeky X-rated joke to his date during last night’s Celebrity First Dates Hotel.

The Blue singer was coupled up to go on a romantic date with Joao in the episode, which ran as part of Channel 4’s Stand Up To Cancer campaign.

The date actually began in an unexpected way as it turned out they already knew each other.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The couple were enjoying some battered fish balls on their dinner date, when Duncan almost made Joao choke with his saucy joke.

Joao, from Portugal told the singer that he wasn’t usually a ‘fish fan’, and Duncan jokily replied: ‘I’m sure you’ve had some balls in your mouth before.’

After they had recovered from their giggling fit, Duncan opened up to his date about his troubled relationship with his father.

Duncan and his date laughed over a dish of fish balls

(Picture: Channel 4)

Joao predicted celebrity Duncan would have ‘loads of guys on the go’ but enjoyed getting to know the real him on the date.

The Hollyoaks actor also revealed Joao was one of the first men he had ever dated publicly since coming out.

Duncan first came out as bisexual in 2009 but in 2014 said that he identified as gay.

Duncan made an x-rated to his date which made him choke (Picture: Channel 4)

Joao confessed he would like to see Duncan again, but in a rather awkward moment, the Too Close hitmaker said he didn’t feel the same.

Duncan said that if there was a spark between them it would have happened already, as they already knew one another.

He added that he had invited Joao to his show before but he didn’t turn up.

‘I was very busy,’ Joao sighed.

But then came an awkward moment…(Picture: Channel 4)

‘I’m 41 and I want something really special’, said Duncan.

The star also opened up about his troubled relationship with his father.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He talked about his pain when his estranged dad, who did not want anything to do with Duncan or his mother, sold a story about him to the press.

Since the show was filmed Duncan has gone on to find love (Picture: Channel 4)

In the story, the noughties heartthrob’s father even went so far as to say his son got his musical talent from him.

He also revealed he was worrying about approaching 50 and being alone. He said: ‘I’ve never openly gone out there in the public eye and dated a guy. I’ve always been very private.

‘So this is a big, huge step for me.’

Viewers quickly took to Twitter to share their shock over Duncan’s decision not to see Joao again.

One tweeted: ‘ I thought Duncan and the other guy seemed well matched.’

‘I’m shocked at Duncan’s reaction’ said another, which was followed by: ‘Can’t believe Duncan wouldn’t date him.’

His date may not have been a success, but since filming the show, Duncan has found love and is now dating Brazilian-Belgian model Rodrigo Reis.

First Dates Hotel airs Thursday nights at 9pm on Channel 4.
